DataElement.preferredName: CoPaQ Caregiver Receive Training Duration Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Number representing the time duration that patient's caregiver received training.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cost for Patients Questionnaire Caregiver Receive Training and Education Duration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess an individual's expenses as a result of their state of health. It includes questions about out-of-pocket costs, time required for travel or for booking medical services, and loss of income.:The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional._To take, accept, or get something offered._To teach theory and hands on experience_The period of time during which something continues.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Value expressed as a number with 3 total digits and no decimals.
